about_the_game:
YRek Lost In Portals.

is a FPS game with adventure in mind, it is inspired by the old classic games like Doom, Turok, Hexen, Heretic.

You are stranded on a Portal adventure with an AI that will help you on your journey.


You are there to survive the long way back home, lots of foes and unexpected enemies will try to get you out of the way.

There are 5 weapons available on the Demo
Intelligent enemies with unique patterns during fights.
Dismemberment is part of the game with a katana weapon.
Incredible soundtracks on the entire journey.
Dinosaurs, Worms, Humanoids, Spiders, Snakes, will be there to challenge you

content_descriptors.notes: Will contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence and Strong Language

name: YRek Lost In Portals Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, RX 460 (4GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An Action-Adventure First Person Shooter, with big boss fights encounter and dungeon exploration. Fps inspired by the old Fps of the 1990s, Getting ammo, weapons and Health to survive the Adventure against enemy foes is the game abouts.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
